backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings and metadata for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light and dark OKLCH color palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls which screen is shown and manages transitions between opening, transition, and celebration views.
frontend/src/components/valentine/consta: Defines all opening screen text, No‑message list, and celebration screen strings.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalC: Renders the final celebration UI with floating hearts, GIF, emojis, and optional background music.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Firewo: Canvas component generating animated pink fireworks using particles and physics.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoButt: A No button that jumps to random on‑screen positions on click while preserving styling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Opening UI showing the name, question, Yes/No buttons, and cycling No‑response messages.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesTra: Fade‑to‑black transition that triggers fireworks before switching to the celebration screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for this frontend-only project.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom Valentine-themed color variables and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Valentine’s Day web experience, its features, requirements, and current state.
